document_data.name: Central Thorass
document_data.mainbody: The '''Central Thorass''' language subgroup included [[Chondathan language|Chondathan]] and [[Common]] and a large number of their lesser-known derivative languages and dialects.<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}
document_data.Languages:
Despite the name, the parent language of the languages in this group was [[Jhaamdathan language|Jhaamdathan]], or "Old Chondathan". Modern [[Chondathan language|Chondathan]] derived directly from Old Chondathan,<ref name=RoF-p86> while [[Thorass language|Thorass]]/Old Common, the original trade language of [[Faerûn]], was a mixture of [[Alzhedo]] and Jhaamdathan.<ref name=RoF-p85> [[Common]] was simply a modern version of Thorass.<ref name=RoF-p85/>

From Thorass sprang a number of lesser-known languages and dialects, including:<ref name=D:SiT-p28/>
* [[Northern language|Northern]]
* [[Auld Cormanthan]]
* [[Cormanthan]]
* "[[Maiden's Tongue]]"
document_data.Script: All the languages in this group used the [[Thorass alphabet]].
